BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO HK_AREA_MST(NUM_HK_AREA_ID, STR_HK_AREA_NAME, NUM_TOTAL_AREA, NUM_NO_OF_ROOM, NUM_NO_OF_TOILET, NUM_NO_OF_CORRIDOR, NUM_NO_OF_STAIR, GSTR_REMARKS, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
INSERT INTO HK_AREA_AREATYPE_MAP(NUM_HK_AREA_ID, HDRNUM_AREA_TYPE_CODE, NUM_ACTUAL_AREA_CODE, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE HK_AREA_MST SET STR_HK_AREA_NAME =? , NUM_TOTAL_AREA =? , NUM_NO_OF_ROOM =? , NUM_NO_OF_TOILET =? , NUM_NO_OF_CORRIDOR =? , NUM_NO_OF_STAIR =? , GSTR_REMARKS =? , GNUM_ISVALID =? , GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID =?, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=? where NUM_HK_AREA_ID=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
DELETE FROM HK_AREA_AREATYPE_MAP WHERE NUM_HK_AREA_ID=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
INSERT INTO HK_AREA_AREATYPE_MAP(NUM_HK_AREA_ID, HDRNUM_AREA_TYPE_CODE, NUM_ACTUAL_AREA_CODE, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE HK_AREA_MST SET GNUM_ISVALID =0 , GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID =?, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=? where NUM_HK_AREA_ID=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE HK_AREA_AREATYPE_MAP SET GNUM_ISVALID =0 WHERE NUM_HK_AREA_ID=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
